```{r setup}
library(simcuber)
library(dplyr)
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
```

# Create grid
```{r}
grid_df <- st_make_grid(
  observations_buffered,
  square = TRUE,
  cellsize = c(200, 200)
) %>%
  st_sf()
```

visualize grid

```{r}
ggplot(data = grid_df) +
  geom_sf(color = "red", fill = "darkgreen")
```
